snippet.title: Pył (Dust) [PC/DOS gameplay]
snippet.description:
Pył (Dust in english) is a polish FPS, developed by Optimus Nexus, and released in 1998. The game features story similiar to Borderlands, some nice visuals (for the DOS standards), an excellent soundtrack and a bit different approach to the gameplay, where it's a bit more on exploration and survival, rather than blunt force and constant shooting.
Pył was quite a success in Poland upon release.
